resources.string:
Hi, I am Thenmozhi. 

 I can eat same food, day-in-day-out and not get bored. 

 I can listen to same song non-stop in loop for days and still enjoy it. This freaks out all my buddies :). 

 I love the fragrance of wet mud. 

 I like to dream. 

 I have few close friends. 

 I love chocolates, in anything and everything. 

 Steaming hot cup of ginger-cardamom-pepper milk-tea is my favourite beverage. 

 And my Mommy's love transforms it into ambrosia. 

 Cold coffee (light) with ice-cream comes next. 

 Amongst flowers, I love the fragrance of Jasmine and Lavender. 

 I like neat-n-tidy bed with a crease-less sheet on it (just like you see in your hotel rooms). 

 I am practitioner of subtlety. 

 I am very optimistic about my pessimismMy Belief. 

 If faith in ourselves had been more extensively taught and practiced, I am sure a very large portion of the evils and miseries that we have would have vanished. 

 I'm a student of practice (just as one of my profs is Professor of the Practice). 

 I think good algorithms should be like bikinisâ€¦ It should save people a lot of guesswork. 

 I hate deadlines to the CORE! Because it's not.
